org.simplity.json

  • Packages that use org.simplity.json 
    Package Description
    org.simplity.auth
    standard authentication schemes and implementations
    org.simplity.gateway  
    org.simplity.json
    This package is a clone of org.json.
    org.simplity.kernel  
    org.simplity.kernel.data  
    org.simplity.kernel.db
    classes that deal with rdbms on top of jdbc
    org.simplity.kernel.dm
    Data Model
    org.simplity.kernel.util
    various utility classes
    org.simplity.rest
    classes that handle open-api requests
    org.simplity.rest.param  
    org.simplity.service
    as a client, this is all you need to know as to how to ask the server for a service and get response.
    org.simplity.test  
    org.simplity.tp  
  • Classes in org.simplity.json used by org.simplity.auth 
    Class and Description
    JSONArray
    A JSONArray is an ordered sequence of values.

  • Classes in org.simplity.json used by org.simplity.json 
    Class and Description
    JSONArray
    A JSONArray is an ordered sequence of values.
    JSONException
    The JSONException is thrown by the JSON.org classes when things are amiss.
    JSONObject
    A JSONObject is an unordered collection of name/value pairs.
    JSONTokener
    A JSONTokener takes a source string and extracts characters and tokens from it.
    JSONWriter
    JSONWriter provides a quick and convenient way of producing JSON text.
